description: Tuna and artichoke fettuccine is a simple store cupboard ingredient dish to have up your sleeve.
keywords: Seafood pasta,Fish,Low saturated fat,High protein,Lemon,Low sugar
name: Tuna & Artichoke Fettuccine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pot of water to the boil and cook the fettuccine according to pack instructions and drain, reserving 200ml of starchy water.

Heat the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the artichokes, garlic, lemon juice and zest for 3 minutes. Stir in the tuna, breaking up with a wooden spoon and cook for 1-2 minutes to heat through.
Tip the fettuccine into the pan and toss to coat, adding starchy water as necessary to loosen. Serve with parmesan and fresh parsley on top.
